title: Did Rashida Tlaib and Ilhan Omar Co-Sponsor a Bill to Recognize Muslim Holidays as Federal Holidays?
subtitle: A dubious website said the first two Muslim women elected to Congress wasted no time in trying to rearrange the national holiday schedule.
author: David Emery
vclaim: U.S. Representatives Rashid Tlaib and Ilhan Omar co-sponsored legislation to recognize Muslim holidays as federal holidays.
